thread.title: BRIEF-Azure Power - Won 200 Megawatt Solar Power Project Through Auction Conducted By Solar Energy Corp Of India

title: BRIEF-Azure Power - Won 200 Megawatt Solar Power Project Through Auction Conducted By Solar Energy Corp Of India

organizations.name: megawatt solar power project through auct
megawatt solar power project through auction conducted by solar energy corp of india
solar energy corp of india reuters

text:
41 AM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Azure Power - Won 200 Megawatt Solar Power Project Through Auction Conducted By Solar Energy Corp Of India Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Jan 9 (Reuters) - Azure Power Global Ltd: 
* AZURE POWER - WON 200 MEGAWATT SOLAR POWER PROJECT THROUGH AUCTION CONDUCTED BY SOLAR ENERGY CORPORATION OF INDIA 
* AZURE POWER - SOLAR PLANT WILL BE SET UP AT BHADLA SOLAR PARK IN RAJASTHAN AND IS LIKELY TO BE COMMISSIONED IN 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
